entry.def: A megahertz is a unit of frequency, used especially for radio frequencies. One megahertz equals one million cycles per second.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Sarma also said the sector needs at least 500 megahertz of additional bandwidth by 2015 to keep pace with growth.
